mapper.select: select t.* from outpay t where t.id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into outpay ( type, money, create_user, create_time) values ( #{type},#{money},#{createUser},#{createTime})
mapper.update: update outpay set class_id = #{classId}, type=#{type}, money=#{money}, create_user=#{createUser}, create_time={createTime} where id=#{id}
